trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing the site from which it originated.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref> class with name of the site that determines membership.
Code satisfies this membership condition if it is downloaded from a site whose DNS name matches the site specified by <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site%2A>.
The site name or wildcard expression.
The site parameter is .
The site parameter is not a valid .
Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
This membership condition tests only <xref:System.Security.Policy.Site> evidence.
The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> against which to make the test.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Determines whether the site from the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref> object is equivalent to the site contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the site from the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref> object is equivalent to the site contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property for the current object or the specified object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
The e parameter is .
The e parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context, used to resolve <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
The e parameter is .
The e parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
The hash code for the current membership condition.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the site for which the membership condition tests.
This property is matched against the site from which a code assembly originates to test the membership condition.
The site for which the membership condition tests.
An attempt is made to set Site to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
An attempt is made to set Site to an invalid <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Site"></xref>.
Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
A string representation of the membership condition.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context, used to resolve <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.SiteMembershipCondition.Site*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
